bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Packing all items into the box.

rules.1: you should never pick and place a box
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the 3D object must be in the bin before
rules.4: you must push a soft object to make more space in the bin, however, if there is a fragile object on the soft object, you must not push the object
